reviewText: I missed much characters from the first seasons, and hey! Where are the third and the fouth seasons??? Amazon, please, let's sell them!!!!!!!!!!!

i got really excited when i sad the dvds on sale i purchased both of the movies but it came to my surprise that the novela was incomplete there's four seasons and only the first two are available the rest i guess they won't be making them anymore or i don't think they were created in the first place that's a really turn down so i recommend not to buy them.
This is a great summary of and actual Telenovela, with over 14 hours of video, its not the full thing, but a good summary, that follows the main story lines and the main characters
I think the product its amazing. I got the DVD's on time. If you are interested on drama, action, and love this is perfect for you.
What is the difference between this novela(segunda temporada) and the other one that is the same segunda temporada? They both say the same title but different cover?

This novela is one of the best for teenagers who enjoy them.  I am sure you will be satisfied and get hooked just like I have.  If you like this product then I definitely recommend Rebelde (1a,2nda, and 3ra temporada!).

THE CLASE 406 DVD IS AWSOME.....IT SHOWS AL MOST EVERYTHING FROM THE NOVELA!THE DVD'S THAT ARE IN THE BOX ARE DOUBLE SIDED..SO YOU GET FOOTAGE ON BOTH SIDES OF THE DVD..THEY ALSO GIVE YOU UPCOMING SCENES FROM THE SEASON 2...THEY GIVE YOU CAST BIO'S...ITS INCREDIBLE! YOU NEED TO BUY THE NOVELA..ITS WOTH EVERY PENNY!
Buena novela esta si bino en buen estado (:
The movie plays but then starts to freeze up while already playing. Maybe this one was defective but still what an inconvenience.

I bought these after reading other reviews that turned out to be true. I received the package when estimated, so that was good however these discs are not new. They are resealed and repackaged, some even have scratches. I bought both available seasons and the same thing.
LOVE this novela,wish all their season were available for purchase
I must say that I bought this CD new and it is scratched. I cleaned it put it back in the DVD player and still the same. I cleaned it put it in my laptop and still the same .
Discs are scratched and I bought it new........you can still watch it but it pauses alot and I've already cleaned them. Problem still persists
Good condition but skipped a lot of episodes.
